message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, considering the value it offers. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your time, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. Let's try to find a compromise. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $10,500, so my counteroffer is $10,000. Let's see if we can make a deal.

Bob, I'm glad we're getting closer. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a fair price considering the product's value.  I really want to make this deal work, so let's see if we can find common ground.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $11,000, so my counteroffer is $10,500. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
